articles.title: At least 3 deputies killed in explosion at L.A. County sheriff's training facility
articles.description: At least three people were killed Friday in an explosion at the Los Angeles County Sheriff Department's Biscailuz Training Center, according to law enforcement sources.
articles.content:
L.A. County sheriffâ€™s deputies outside the Biscailuz Center Academy Training Center, where three deputies were killed during a training accident Friday morning.
At least three deputies were killed and another person was injured Friday in an explosion... [5204 chars]
